scripts.build-all: npm run -s build-app & npm run -s build-pwmgr & npm run -s build-api
scripts.build-api: rimraf dist-api-dicekeys-com & parcel build src/api-dicekeys-com.html --no-minify --out-dir dist-api-dicekeys-com/ --out-file index.html
scripts.upload-api: gsutil -m cp dist-api-dicekeys-com/* gs://api.dicekeys.app/ & gsutil setmeta -h "Cache-Control:no-store; Content-Type: text/html" gs://api.dicekeys.app/index.html & gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" gs://api.dicekeys.app/*.js
scripts.update-api: npm run -s build-api & npm run -s upload-api
scripts.build-app: rimraf dist-app & parcel build src/index.html --no-minify --out-dir dist-app/
scripts.build-pwmgr: rimraf dist-pwmgr & parcel build src/pwmgr.html --no-minify --out-dir dist-pwmgr/ --out-file index.html
scripts.upload-production: gsutil -m cp dist-app/* gs://dicekeys.app/ & gsutil setmeta -h "Cache-Control:no-store" gs://dicekeys.app/index.html & gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" gs://dicekeys.app/*.js
scripts.update-production: npm run -s build-app & npm run -s upload-production
scripts.upload-staging: gsutil -m cp -z js dist-app/* gs://staging.dicekeys.app/ & gsutil setmeta -h "Cache-Control:no-store; Content-Type: text/html" gs://staging.dicekeys.app/index.html & gsutil -m setmeta -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" gs://staging.dicekeys.app/*.js
scripts.update-staging: npm run -s build-app & npm run -s upload-staging
scripts.update-pwmgr: npm run -s build-pwmgr & npm run -s upload-pwmgr
